featured.headline: Anthropic acquires computer-use AI startup Vercept after Meta poached one of its founders
featured.summary: Seattle-based Vercept developed complex agentic tools, including a computer-use agent that could complete tasks inside applications like a person with a laptop would....

secondary_2.headline: The White House wants AI companies to cover rate hikes. Most have already said they would.
